responses.greeting: Hello! Welcome to Junior Developer Chatbot. How can I assist you today?
responses.internship: We offer exciting internship opportunities for junior developers in various technical domains. Would you like to know more about our internship programs?
responses.course: We provide comprehensive training programs in CAD, AutoCAD, Revit, and other technical skills. What specific area are you interested in learning?
responses.technical: Our technical training covers Computer-Aided Design (CAD), AutoCAD, Revit, and other industry-standard software. Can you tell me more about your specific interests?
responses.contact: You can reach us at contact@techvriti.com or call +91 8431273912 for more information about our programs.
